review_text:
I understand there are several locations of this restaurant, yet there was nothing that felt like a chain here. The pear tea is a very old fashioned and rare thing in most Beijing restaurants, and I understand from locals that it's prepared in the proper way. Everything we had was delicious. Seriously delicious! For dessert we chose walnut cookies shaped...
Ещё

Great restaurant, part of a chain. The pear soup is a must have, as is the custard fish. Tell them your dietary preferences and they're good about following them. Very tasty, the place is always packed at meal times. Always noisy. Small tables. Medium prices, not expensive. Wide variety of stuff on the menu. Been many times. Never a bad...
